mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SPONSOR(sponsorSeq, userSeq, sponsorItemSeq, sponsorAmount, sponsorTotalPrice, sponsorShippingAddr, sponsorName, sponsorPhone, payment, memo) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(max(sponsorSeq), 0) + 1 FROM SPONSOR), #{userSeq}, #{sponsorItemSeq}, #{sponsorAmount}, #{sponsorTotalPrice}, #{sponsorShippingAddr}, #{sponsorName}, #{sponsorPhone}, #{payment}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select rownum, s.sponsorseq, si.sponsoritemname, s.sponsoramount, s.sponsortotalprice, s.sponsorshippingaddr, s.sponsordate from sponsor s, sponsor_item si where s.sponsoritemseq = si.sponsoritemseq and s.userseq = #{userSeq} order by s.sponsorseq desc

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY sponsor.sponsorseq) as num, sponsor.*, sponsor_item.sponsoritemname from sponsor, sponsor_item where sponsor_item.sponsoritemseq = sponsor.sponsoritemseq order by num desc
select users.userId, users.username, users.userphone, users.useremail, sponsor.* from users, sponsor where users.userseq = sponsor.userseq and sponsorseq = #{sponsorSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sponsor_item(sponsorItemSeq, sponsorItemName, sponsorItemImg, sponsorItemPrice, sponsorItemCode, sponsorItemState) VALUES ((select nvl(max(sponsorItemSeq), 0) + 1 from sponsor_item), #{sponsorItemName}, #{sponsorItemImg}, #{sponsorItemPrice}, #{sponsorItemCode}, #{sponsorItemState})
mapper.update: UPDATE sponsor_item SET sponsorItemName = #{sponsorItemName}, sponsorItemImg = #{sponsorItemImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sponsorItemPrice = #{sponsorItemPrice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sponsorItemCode = #{sponsorItemCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sponsorItemState = #{sponsorItemState} where sponsorItemSeq = #{sponsorItemSeq}
mapper.select: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY sponsor_item.sponsoritemseq) as num, sponsor_item.* from sponsor_item order by num desc
